info.title: Azure Media Services
info.description: Streaming resource management client for Azure Media Services

get.description: Lists the Live Events in the account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The Media Services account name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The Version of the API to be used with the client request.

default.description: The streaming error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.

expiration.description: The expiration time of the authentication key.

clientAccessPolicy.description: The content of clientaccesspolicy.xml used by Silverlight.

crossDomainPolicy.description: The content of crossdomain.xml used by Silverlight.

fragmentsPerTsSegment.description: The amount of fragments per HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) segment.

name.description: The friendly name for the IP address range.

subnetPrefixLength.description: The subnet mask prefix length (see CIDR notation).

IPRange.description: The IP address range in the CIDR scheme.

location.description: The Azure Region of the resource.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

removeOutputsOnStop.description: The flag indicates if remove LiveOutputs on Stop.

LiveEventActionInput.description: The LiveEvent action input parameter definition.

encodingType.description: The encoding type for Live Event.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

presetName.description: The encoding preset name.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

accessToken.description: A unique identifier for a stream.  This can be specified at creation time but cannot be updated.  If omitted, the service will generate a unique value.

endpoints.description: The input endpoints for the Live Event.

keyFrameIntervalDuration.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of the key frame interval duration.

streamingProtocol.description: The streaming protocol for the Live Event.  This is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

LiveEventInputAccessControl.description: The IP access control for Live Event Input.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of Live Outputs.

value.description: The result of the List Live Event operation.

LiveEventOutputTranscriptionTrack.description: Describes a transcription track in the output of a Live Event, generated using speech-to-text transcription.

alternativeMediaId.description: An Alternative Media Identifier associated with the StreamingLocator created for the preview.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.  The identifier can be used in the CustomLicenseAcquisitionUrlTemplate or the CustomKeyAcquisitionUrlTemplate of the StreamingPolicy specified in the StreamingPolicyName field.

previewLocator.description: The identifier of the preview locator in Guid format.  Specifying this at creation time allows the caller to know the preview locator url before the event is created.  If omitted, the service will generate a random identifier.  This value cannot be updated once the live event is created.

streamingPolicyName.description: The name of streaming policy used for the LiveEvent preview.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

LiveEventPreviewAccessControl.description: The IP access control for Live Event preview.

created.description: The exact time the Live Event was created.

lastModified.description: The exact time the Live Event was last modified.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Live Event.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the Live Event.

streamOptions.description: The options to use for the LiveEvent.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

vanityUrl.description: Specifies whether to use a vanity url with the Live Event.  This value is specified at creation time and cannot be updated.

inputTrackSelection.description: Provides a mechanism to select the audio track in the input live feed, to which speech-to-text transcription is applied.

language.description: Specifies the language (locale) used for speech-to-text transcription ï¿½ it should match the spoken language in the audio track. The value should be in BCP-47 format of 'language tag-region' (e.g: 'en-US'). The list of supported languages are 'en-US' and 'en-GB'.

LiveEventTranscription.description: Describes the transcription tracks in the output of a Live Event, generated using speech-to-text transcription.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of Live Outputs.

value.description: The result of the List Live Output operation.

archiveWindowLength.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of the archive window length. This is duration that customer want to retain the recorded content.

created.description: The exact time the Live Output was created.

description.description: The description of the Live Output.

lastModified.description: The exact time the Live Output was last modified.

manifestName.description: The manifest file name.  If not provided, the service will generate one automatically.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Live Output.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the Live Output.

LiveOutputProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create a Live Output.

target.description: The target of the error (for example, the name of the property in error).

location.description: The Azure Region of the resource.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

@odata.nextLink.description: Th link to the next set of results. Not empty if value contains incomplete list of StreamingEndpoints.

value.description: The result of the List StreamingEndpoint operation.

availabilitySetName.description: The name of the AvailabilitySet used with this StreamingEndpoint for high availability streaming.  This value can only be set at creation time.

created.description: The exact time the StreamingEndpoint was created.

customHostNames.description: The custom host names of the StreamingEndpoint

lastModified.description: The exact time the StreamingEndpoint was last modified.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the StreamingEndpoint.

resourceState.description: The resource state of the StreamingEndpoint.

scaleUnits.description: The number of scale units.  Use the Scale operation to adjust this value.

scaleUnit.description: The scale unit number of the StreamingEndpoint.

ApiVersion.name: api-version
ApiVersion.description: The Version of the API to be used with the client request.

LiveEventName.name: liveEventName
LiveEventName.description: The name of the Live Event.

LiveOutputName.name: liveOutputName
LiveOutputName.description: The name of the Live Output.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

StreamingResourceAutoStart.name: autoStart
StreamingResourceAutoStart.description: The flag indicates if the resource should be automatically started on creation.

SubscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionId.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.
